ChatMe



ChatMe is chatroom web app built with AngularJS and Firebase. The idea here was to allow users to join multiple chatrooms and have topic based conversations. Perhaps users can make new friends or expand their professional network.

Some of the features I plan to add in the future are a user profiles, private chatrooms, email notifications, and hashtags.

Check it out here
